import React, { useContext } from "react"; // Add useContext to the import import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // Ensure Link is imported import AuthContext from "../context/AuthContext"; // Ensure AuthContext is imported const Navbar = ({ title = "CMS" }) => { const { user } = useContext(AuthContext); // Destructure user from AuthContext return (
{title} {/* Use Link for navigation */}
    {user ? ( <>
    • ) : ( <>
  • Login {/* Use Link here */}
  • Register {/* Use Link here */}
    • )}
); }; export default Navbar;
